types.html:
vide-couilles m (plural vide-couilles)

  1. (sex, vulgar) cumdump, cum dumpster
    Synonym: garage à bites
    • 2001, Michel Houellebecq, Plateforme; republished as Frank Wynne, transl., Platform, 2001:
      En se relayant pour la violer les types continuaient à plaisanter et à l’insulter, il la traitait de salope et de vide-couilles.
      As the guys took turns raping her, they continued to taunt and insult her, calling her a slut and a douche bag.

title: vide-couilles
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /vid.kuj/
